name: Meal Wheel
description:
If you are like me, you find it impossible to decide what to eat.

I made this simple wheel to help me decide. Now looking a little more professional, it still helps me choose and should help you as well.

Swipe across the wheel and it will choose a tasty meal for you with a few pictures of each choice. If nothing peaks your interest, click "Spin Again". Found something, click the "Near Me" button and it will open Google maps and search for places near you.

I hope you enjoy.

Look out for more choice wheels coming soon. Check out the Dessert Wheel Dessert Wheel
